wikipedia_page.main: William John Perry (22 September 1886 – 16 February 1970) was a Welsh rugby union player who played rugby union at club level for Neath and was also selected to represent Glamorgan County. Perry represented Wales on one occasion, facing England in 1911.

response: *Bill Perry (rugby union) (1886–1970), Wales rugby union international
*Bill Perry (musician) (1957–2007), American blues singer/songwriter and guitarist
